entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.5°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of wet snow. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of wet snow beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 10 September 2016
